titles.title: HP547 Head of the church, our risen Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Head of the church, our risen Lord,
Who by thy Spirit dost preside
O'er the whole body, by whose word
We all are ruled and sanctified:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Our prayers and intercessions hear
For all thy family at large,
That all in their appointed sphere
Their proper service may discharge.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So, through the grace derived from thee,
In whom all fullness dwells above,
May thy whole church united be,
And edify itself in love.
